name: Jelly-the candy land
description:
Follow Jelly to embark on a magical mystery journey. Drag the randomly generated jellies into the chessboard, match 3 or more jellies in a row to make the Jelly grow!The more jellies in a row, the faster the Jelly grow! Want a taste of Jelly? We have tons for ya!

It’s an eye opener: Just drag and eliminate to feast your eyes on the miracle.
It’s a no brainer: Just take a sip of coffee and control everything on your palm.
Immerse yourself in the world of jellies, these little cuties will melt your heart ~ o(*≧▽≦)ツ~

3 in a Row，Good Times Roll!
